sentence.Network_en: After twenty years as a chain smoker Mr Nathe has given up the habit.
sentence.Network_cn: 当了20年的烟鬼后，纳特先生戒了烟。

sentence.Network_en: Henry is a chain smoker, smoking at least five packs a day.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨利烟瘾很大, 每天最少吸五包.

sentence.Network_en: He is no smoker, but his father is a chain - smoker.
sentence.Network_cn: 他倒是不抽烟, 但他的爸爸却一支接一支地抽(是个老烟枪).

PerfectNetExp.abs: 沪江博客 - 徐星海的博客 - 中口 ... 11 、 in vain 徒劳的 12 、 chain-smoker 一支接以至抽烟的人 15 、 finals 期末考.

list.abs: 光影快客的博客 - 光影快客 - 网易博客 ... cats got one's tongue 哑口无言 chain smoker 老烟枪 come up with 产生，想出.
Angry Editor ... 醉鬼–  drunkard 烟鬼– opium addict;chain smoker 调皮鬼–  naughty child.

entry.tran: 一支接一支地抽烟的人
entry.def: A chain-smoker is a person who chain-smokes.

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy smoker (usually of cigarettes) who lights one off of another

auth_sentence.content: They are the entire middle of the food chain.
